full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Reference Information
- **Tender Title**: Dry Ice
- **Reference Number**: WS3626188267-Doc3626347453
- **Amendment Number**: 1

## Tender Information
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3626188267
- **Publication Date**: October 13, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 23, 2022 at 2:00 p.m. (EST)
- **Tender Status**: Cancelled

## Contract Requirements
- **Contract Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (G and S)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Duration**: The proposed contract will commence on January 1, 2023 and end on December 31, 2024.
- **Trade Agreements**: The Canadian Health Measures Survey at Statistics Canada has entered into an agreement with Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Delivery Requirements
- **Delivery Locations**:
	+ Quebec (except National Capital Region)
	+ Nova Scotia
	+ New Brunswick
	+ Saskatchewan
	+ Ontario (except National Capital Region)
	+ British Columbia
	+ Alberta
- **Frequency of Delivery**: Dry ice will be required on a weekly basis for 5 weeks + 1 optional week.

## Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, Canada K1A 0S5
- **End-User Entity**: Statistics Canada (StatCan)
- **End-User Entity Address**: 150 Tunney's Pasture Driveway, Ottawa, ON, Canada K1A 0T6
- **Point of Contact**: Shen, Tao (SPAC/PSPC) [tao.shen@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tao.shen@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice and Documentation
- **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14113262?extsite=MTQxMTMyNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com
